mapper.select: SELECT cat.id as catId,cat.category_type as catType,cat.category_name as catName,cat.category_code as catCode, case cat.category_type when 'blog' then (SELECT count(1) from articles_blog artb where artb.category_id=cat.id) when 'life' then (SELECT count(1) from articles_life artl where artl.category_id=cat.id) end as artcount from category cat where cat.category_type='blog' or cat.category_type='life' ORDER BY artcount DESC
